content: crochet a very cute dog keychain with this free pattern this pattern is also available as a youtube video https //youtu be/7658ssv8mdi the pattern is available for free in english and dutch when you make it with cotton sport weight yarn the size will be 6 cm/ 2 inch you can make it bigger by using thicker yarn and a larger crochet hook the bigger dog on the photo is made from velvet yarn and a 3 5mm hook
